verses.verse: And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> on his way, <S%H1870><s%> and the angels <S%H4397><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> met <S%H6293><s%> him.

And when <S%H834><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> them, he said, <S%H559><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> is God's <S%H430><s%> host: <S%H4264><s%> and he called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of that <S%H1931><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> Mahanaim. <S%H4266><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him to <S%H413><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%> unto the land <S%H776><s%> of Seir, <S%H8165><s%> the country <S%H7704><s%> of Edom. <S%H123><s%>

And he commanded <S%H6680><s%> them, saying, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> shall ye speak <S%H559><s%> unto my lord <S%H113><s%> Esau; <S%H6215><s%> Thy servant <S%H5650><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> thus, <S%H3541><s%> I have sojourned <S%H1481><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> Laban, <S%H3837><s%> and stayed there <S%H309><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> now: <S%H6258><s%>

And I have <S%H1961><s%> oxen, <S%H7794><s%> and asses, <S%H2543><s%> flocks, <S%H6629><s%> and menservants, <S%H5650><s%> and womenservants: <S%H8198><s%> and I have sent <S%H7971><s%> to tell <S%H5046><s%> my lord, <S%H113><s%> that I may find <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in thy sight. <S%H5869><s%>

And the messengers <S%H4397><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> We came <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> thy brother <S%H251><s%> Esau, <S%H6215><s%> and also <S%H1571><s%> he cometh <S%H1980><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> thee, and four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> men <S%H376><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him.

Then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> was greatly afraid <S%H3372><s%> <S%H3966><s%> and distressed: <S%H3334><s%> and he divided <S%H2673><s%> <S%H853><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was with <S%H854><s%> him, and the flocks, <S%H6629><s%> and herds, <S%H1241><s%> and the camels, <S%H1581><s%> into two <S%H8147><s%> bands; <S%H4264><s%>

And said, <S%H559><s%> If <S%H518><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%> come <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the one <S%H259><s%> company, <S%H4264><s%> and smite <S%H5221><s%> it, then the other company <S%H4264><s%> which is left <S%H7604><s%> shall escape. <S%H6413><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> O God <S%H430><s%> of my father <S%H1><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> of my father <S%H1><s%> Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> which saidst <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Return <S%H7725><s%> unto thy country, <S%H776><s%> and to thy kindred, <S%H4138><s%> and I will deal well <S%H3190><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thee:

I am not worthy <S%H6994><s%> of the least of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> the mercies, <S%H2617><s%> and of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> the truth, <S%H571><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou hast showed <S%H6213><s%> unto <S%H853><s%> thy servant; <S%H5650><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> with my staff <S%H4731><s%> I passed over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> Jordan; <S%H3383><s%> and now <S%H6258><s%> I am become <S%H1961><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> bands. <S%H4264><s%>

Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me, I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> from the hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> of my brother, <S%H251><s%> from the hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> of Esau: <S%H6215><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H595><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> him, lest <S%H6435><s%> he will come <S%H935><s%> and smite <S%H5221><s%> me, and the mother <S%H517><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> the children. <S%H1121><s%>

And thou <S%H859><s%> saidst, <S%H559><s%> I will surely do thee good, <S%H3190><s%> <S%H3190><s%> <S%H5973><s%> and make <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy seed <S%H2233><s%> as the sand <S%H2344><s%> of the sea, <S%H3220><s%> which <S%H834><s%> cannot <S%H3808><s%> be numbered <S%H5608><s%> for multitude. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7230><s%>

And he lodged <S%H3885><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> that same <S%H1931><s%> night; <S%H3915><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> that which came <S%H935><s%> to his hand <S%H3027><s%> a present <S%H4503><s%> for Esau <S%H6215><s%> his brother; <S%H251><s%>
Two hundred <S%H3967><s%> she goats, <S%H5795><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> he goats, <S%H8495><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> ewes, <S%H7353><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%>

Thirty <S%H7970><s%> milch <S%H3243><s%> camels <S%H1581><s%> with their colts, <S%H1121><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> kine, <S%H6510><s%> and ten <S%H6235><s%> bulls, <S%H6499><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> she asses, <S%H860><s%> and ten <S%H6235><s%> foals. <S%H5895><s%>

And he delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of his servants, <S%H5650><s%> every drove <S%H5739><s%> <S%H5739><s%> by themselves; <S%H905><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his servants, <S%H5650><s%> Pass over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me, and put <S%H7760><s%> a space <S%H7305><s%> between <S%H996><s%> drove <S%H5739><s%> and drove. <S%H5739><s%>

And he commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the foremost, <S%H7223><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> When <S%H3588><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%> my brother <S%H251><s%> meeteth <S%H6298><s%> thee, and asketh <S%H7592><s%> thee, saying, <S%H559><s%> Whose <S%H4310><s%> art thou? <S%H859><s%> and whither <S%H575><s%> goest <S%H1980><s%> thou? and whose <S%H4310><s%> are these <S%H428><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee?

Then thou shalt say, <S%H559><s%> They be thy servant <S%H5650><s%> Jacob's; <S%H3290><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is a present <S%H4503><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> unto my lord <S%H113><s%> Esau: <S%H6215><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is behind <S%H310><s%> us.

And so <S%H1571><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> he <S%H853><s%> the second, <S%H8145><s%> and <S%H1571><s%> <S%H853><s%> the third, <S%H7992><s%> and <S%H1571><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that followed <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> the droves, <S%H5739><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> On this <S%H2088><s%> manner <S%H1697><s%> shall ye speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Esau, <S%H6215><s%> when ye find <S%H4672><s%> him.

And say <S%H559><s%> ye moreover, <S%H1571><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> is behind <S%H310><s%> us. For <S%H3588><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> I will appease <S%H3722><s%> <S%H6440><s%> him with the present <S%H4503><s%> that goeth <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me, and afterward <S%H310><s%> <S%H3651><s%> I will see <S%H7200><s%> his face; <S%H6440><s%> peradventure <S%H194><s%> he will accept <S%H5375><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of me.

So went <S%H5674><s%> the present <S%H4503><s%> over before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> him: and himself <S%H1931><s%> lodged <S%H3885><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> night <S%H3915><s%> in the company. <S%H4264><s%>

And he rose up <S%H6965><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> night, <S%H3915><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> his two <S%H8147><s%> wives, <S%H802><s%> and his two <S%H8147><s%> womenservants, <S%H8198><s%> and his eleven <S%H259><s%> <S%H6240><s%> sons, <S%H3206><s%> and passed over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ford <S%H4569><s%> Jabbok. <S%H2999><s%>
And he took <S%H3947><s%> them, and sent them over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> the brook, <S%H5158><s%> and sent over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he had.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> was left <S%H3498><s%> alone; <S%H905><s%> and there wrestled <S%H79><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him until <S%H5704><s%> the breaking <S%H5927><s%> of the day. <S%H7837><s%>

And when he saw <S%H7200><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> he prevailed <S%H3201><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> against him, he touched <S%H5060><s%> the hollow <S%H3709><s%> of his thigh; <S%H3409><s%> and the hollow <S%H3709><s%> of Jacob's <S%H3290><s%> thigh <S%H3409><s%> was out of joint, <S%H3363><s%> as he wrestled <S%H79><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him.

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Let me go, <S%H7971><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the day <S%H7837><s%> breaketh. <S%H5927><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> I will not <S%H3808><s%> let thee go, <S%H7971><s%> except <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> thou bless <S%H1288><s%> me.
And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, What <S%H4100><s%> is thy name? <S%H8034><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Thy name <S%H8034><s%> shall be called <S%H559><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> Israel: <S%H3478><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> as a prince hast thou power <S%H8280><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> God <S%H430><s%> and with <S%H5973><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> and hast prevailed. <S%H3201><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> asked <S%H7592><s%> him, and said, <S%H559><s%> Tell <S%H5046><s%> me, I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> thy name. <S%H8034><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> Wherefore <S%H4100><s%> is it <S%H2088><s%> that thou dost ask <S%H7592><s%> after my name? <S%H8034><s%> And he blessed <S%H1288><s%> him there. <S%H8033><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%> Peniel: <S%H6439><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I have seen <S%H7200><s%> God <S%H430><s%> face <S%H6440><s%> to <S%H413><s%> face, <S%H6440><s%> and my life <S%H5315><s%> is preserved. <S%H5337><s%>

And as <S%H834><s%> he passed over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> Penuel <S%H6439><s%> the sun <S%H8121><s%> rose <S%H2224><s%> upon him, and he <S%H1931><s%> halted <S%H6760><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> his thigh. <S%H3409><s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> of <S%H853><s%> the sinew <S%H1517><s%> which shrank, <S%H5384><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is upon <S%H5921><s%> the hollow <S%H3709><s%> of the thigh, <S%H3409><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he touched <S%H5060><s%> the hollow <S%H3709><s%> of Jacob's <S%H3290><s%> thigh <S%H3409><s%> in the sinew <S%H1517><s%> that shrank. <S%H5384><s%>
